description:
Devoted to personal injury, estate planning and criminal defense, our team at ThePhillyLawyers advocates for clients throughout the Jenkintown and Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, areas. We have an award-winning group of attorneys at our law firm who have earned honors including the following:

• Being named Super Lawyers
• Holding an Avvo "Superb" rating
• Being listed in the American Institute of Criminal Law Attorneys' 10 Best
• Selected for inclusion in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100

Our law firm includes a certified arbitrator, highly experienced litigators and attorneys who have successfully represented countless people. We have more than 50 years of combined experience in our practice areas. The depth of our knowledge and proven legal tactics are why we continuously return favorable outcomes to our clients.

We are a client-centered practice where the people we work with always come first. Not only do we focus on going through each case with strict attention to detail, but we also strive to bring matters to a close quickly so our clients can move forward with their lives. Our compassionate attorneys are available through calls, texts, emails or in-person visitations.

ThePhillyLawyers offers free initial consultations. We accept credit cards, and the team at our law firm has the ability to provide services in Spanish.
